attributes.action: Petition to give Gareth Southgate the Knighthood he rightly deserves.
attributes.background:
This man has totally transformed our national team over the last few years. Most recently getting them qualified for the Euro 2020 final.

He's given us all something to believe in, inspired children across the country and brought everybody together. In short, he's given us all hope.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, including petitions calling for someone to be given a knighthood, as there is already a separate process for that. You can find out more about how to nominate someone for an honour or award here: https://www.gov.uk/honours.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You may like to sign this petition which calls for a related action:

'Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
